text:
Dr. Paul Nassif net worth: Paul Nassif is a plastic surgeon who has a net worth of $14 million. Paul Nassif has earned his net worth from his specialty in rhinoplasty. He appeared on the show Dr. 90210, and is known as a skilled facial plastic and reconstructive surgeon. Nassif is married to American businesswoman, philanthropist Adrienne Maloof-Nassif who appeared on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. Born in Los Angeles, California, he is dedicated to helping patients less fortunate.

Paul S. Nassif, MD was born in Los Angeles, California. Nassif graduated from the University of Southern California School of Medicine in 1992. He is licensed in both California and Nevada. He is a revision and ethnic rhinoplastic specialist who has patients from around the world. Paul is a specialist with nose jobs. Nassif teaches at the University of Southern California and the University of California, Los Angeles schools of medicine. He has been featured on Dr. 90210 and has appeared on NBC Nightly News, Inside Edition, CBS Healthbeat, Entertainment Tonight, the Today Show, Good Morning America, and EXTRA. He practices in Beverly Hills, California. Dr. Nassif is featured on the E! series Botched, which is about reversing bad plastic surgery. His ex-wife is Adrienne Maloof from Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. He has three boys and is an avid golfer. He is now dating Chantell de Jong.
